title: A Balance of Fun

en: It hits you while you're working: you really haven't had time for fun this month. The things that used to take up your time - TV, friends, hobbies - have fallen away in favor of your overall goal. You wonder whether this is a good thing, or whether you should make time for fun.

no_caption: Now is the time to hustle

en: You make some time that evening to do something just for the enjoyment of it, and it completely refreshes you. There's more to life than just work!
There will be time for fun once you've truly established yourself, you decide.
